resources.string: NHS Co-Locate
\u2022 your device’s location, to record places you’ve spent time in
\u2022 Bluetooth, to record when your device is near others using this app
Help the NHS stop the spread of coronavirus in the UK
Your location will not be tracked, and is needed for Bluetooth to work. Your location history and personal identity will remain protected.
Learn more about how it works
You’ll be asked to consent to these permissions on the next screen.
Start Now
This app works using Bluetooth signals, to determine when you’re near someone else with this app. Please make sure your Bluetooth is on at all times.
Coronavirus
Please activate Bluetooth
Have you been diagnosed with coronavirus?

Yes

Notify
You have been near someone who has coronavirus symptoms
You need to isolate yourself and stay at home
Help us keep others safe
This app has recorded all contact you’ve had with other people using this app over the past 14 days.
Sharing this information with the NHS means we can notify these people to take steps to keep themselves safe.
How you can protect yourself and others
You\'re okay right now

This is a real-time status based on people you’ve been in contact with.

You’ll get an alert if your status changes.

 It’s important that you tell us if you develop any new symptoms.
If you develop symptoms

You can stay safe by washing your hands more regularly and avoiding large gatherings of people.

Visit NHS 111 for more advice on protecting yourself and people you care about.

Thank you for helping us slow the spread of coronavirus.
Use our online tool to check your symptoms.
Check my symptoms
colocate-locate
Please isolate

NHS Coronavirus
"Someone you've been nearby recently was just diagnosed with coronavirus.\n\nYou should isolate yourself and get tested."
Something went wrong, please try again later.
General
Your app is set up and ready to go

Keep Bluetooth and push notifications enabled for the duration of the outbreak, to help protect yourself from coronavirus.\n\nOnce the outbreak ends, you can turn off these permissions, or delete the app.
Start using the app
Retry
This app cannot function without permissions
Set up app permissions
Bluetooth
Location
Continue
Thank you for playing your part in helping the NHS to stop the spread of coronavirus.
Start using the app
How the app works

This app gives you advice if you have been near someone who later develops coronavirus symptoms. The app uses your phone to detect other app users nearby.

If you think you have coronavirus symptoms you can add them in this app. The NHS will then let others know they have been near someone who has developed symptoms. This helps protect everyone and the NHS.

Your identity is not shared with other app users. The NHS will protect your identity. All information is stored securely.

Read more about the app, the privacy policy and all terms and conditions.
Go back

If you have coronavirus symptoms, the NHS will ask for the proximity information collected on your phone so that we can alert others that they may be at risk.\n\nThis information will be encrypted, and is only shared with the NHS. Your location history and personal identity will remain protected.
"Read our privacy policy and terms and conditions. "
Will Bluetooth affect my phone’s battery life?
This app uses low energy Bluetooth which will have minimal effect on your battery life.
Debug NHS
For debug purposes only.\n\nReset will clear out the registration, status, and all contact events.
Please turn Bluetooth on
This app can only protect you and others if Bluetooth is on all the time
Enable Bluetooth
Please turn Location on
This app can only protect you and others if Location is on all the time
Go to your Settings
Started %s
Do you have a high temperature?
You don\'t need a thermometer or to know a precise temperature. If you feel hot to touch on your chest or back answer \'yes\'.
Do you have a new continuous cough?
I have a new, continuous cough (I am coughing a lot for more than an hour, or have had 3 or more coughing episodes in 24 hours)
Thank you for sharing this data with the NHS.

Thank you for sharing this data with the NHS. We will use this information to anonymously inform people they have come into contact with covid symptoms and encourage them to self-isolate.\nThank you for helping us save lives

This information will be used to help your local NHS respond to the coronavirus in your area and to understand the spread of the disease across the UK. Your postcode will not be used to track your location.
Valid post code is required

Start following general advice
Although you still have a continuous cough, you no longer need to self-isolate and can begin following general advice.
Okay
Your permission is needed to allow the use of Bluetooth

This app uses battery-saving Bluetooth Low Energy to determine when it is near another phone with this app installed. For this to work, Bluetooth needs to be kept on at all times. 

Using Bluetooth means that the app cannot track your location and your privacy remains protected.

If you do not give permission for Bluetooth this app will not work.

To give permission for this app to access Bluetooth, please go to Settings and allow access
Enable Bluetooth
Your permission is needed to allow access to your location

This app is not using Bluetooth or your location to track you. Your personal identity will remain protected at all times.

This app uses battery-saving Bluetooth Low Energy to determine when it is near another phone with this app installed. For this to work, Bluetooth needs to be kept on at all times. 

If you do not allow access to your location this app will not work.

To enable this app to work, please go to Settings and allow access:
Go to App Settings
Go to your Settings
You need to enable location services on your phone

To make Bluetooth work, we need you to turn on location services on your phone.

This app is not using Bluetooth or your location to track you. Your personal identity will remain protected at all times.

This app uses battery-saving Bluetooth Low Energy to determine when it is near another phone with this app installed. For this to work, Bluetooth needs to be kept on at all times. 

If you do not enable location services on your phone this app will not work.

To enable this app to work, please go to Settings and enable location services:
Follow this advice until %1$s
If you don’t have any symptoms, there’s no need to do anything right now.
Feel free to use other apps as normal and you’ll be notified if your advice changes.
If you develop symptoms, please come back to this app.
Please turn your Bluetooth back on

This app works only if your Bluetooth is on at all times.\n\n%1$s works using Bluetooth signals, to determine when you have been near someone else with this app who shows symptoms of Coronavirus. %1$s can alert you or others that may be at risk.
Turn on location services on your phone to continue

To make Bluetooth work, we also need you to turn on location services. Your location will not be tracked. Your location and personal identity will remain protected.

To enable your location you need to turn on your location services on your phone.

%1$s works using Bluetooth signals, to determine when you have been near someone else with this app who shows symptoms of Coronavirus.
Allow this app to access your location to continue

To make Bluetooth work, we also need you to turn on location services and give the app permission to use it. Your location will not be tracked. Your location and personal identity will remain protected.

To enable your location permissions you need to go to your Settings and allow this app to access location services.

%1$s works using Bluetooth signals, to determine when you have been near someone else with this app who shows symptoms of Coronavirus.
